title: Chemistry Series A fundraising metrics benchmarks
summary: Series A biotech benchmarks focus on clinical readiness and data quality. Investors evaluate whether you've sufficiently de-risked to justify larger capital deployment. These benchmarks demonstrate transition from promising science to executable clinical program. Pitchchat keeps fundraising metrics investor-ready in one room.

metrics.label: Development Stage
metrics.note: IND filed/cleared minimum. Phase 1 data significantly increases valuation and optionality.

metrics.label: Clinical Patients Treated
metrics.note: For clinical-stage: patients dosed in trials. Safety and early efficacy signals valuable.

metrics.label: IND-Enabling Studies
metrics.note: GLP toxicology completed. CMC package IND-ready. Pharmacology studies supporting dose selection.

metrics.label: Regulatory Designations
metrics.note: Orphan drug, fast track, breakthrough therapy. Designations signal regulatory pathway clarity.

metrics.label: Patent Grants
metrics.note: Composition-of-matter patents granted in US and EU minimum. Method claims supporting.

metrics.label: CMO Under Contract
metrics.note: Manufacturing partner contracted. Process locked for clinical material. Scale-up path identified.

metrics.label: Pharma Interest
metrics.note: CDAs with 3+ pharma companies. Active diligence or partnership discussions underway.

metrics.label: Scientific Advisors
metrics.note: Key opinion leaders actively engaged. Clinical trial site relationships. Publication support.

metrics.label: Team Size
metrics.note: Team scaled for clinical operations. CMO/CMC, regulatory, and clinical leads in place.

metrics.label: Non-Dilutive Funding
metrics.note: Grants, foundation support, collaborations. Demonstrates external validation and extends runway.
